TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBarPanel extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class StatusBarPanel Inherits Component Implements ISupportInitialize
type StatusBarPanel = class inherit Component interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示 控件中的一个面板。

span.span: Represents a panel in a control.

summary.span: 虽然 控件对以前版本的 控件的功能进行替换和添加，但是考虑到向后兼容性和将来的使用（如果您选择），仍然保留了 。

span.span: Although the control replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 控件的 中的单个面板。A represents an individual panel in the of a control. 可以包含文本和/或图标，可用于反映应用程序的状态。A can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application. 使用 （可通过 控件的 属性访问）来检索、添加或删除单个 。Use the , accessible through the property of a control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual . 提供了属性，使您能够在 控件内修改面板的显示行为。The provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a control. 您可以使用 属性在面板中显示图标。You can use the property to display an icon within a panel. 此属性可用于在应用程序中提供状态的图形化表示形式。This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application. 利用 属性，您可以指定面板内文本和/或图标的对齐方式。The property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel. 若要确保面板大小正确调整以适应面板的文本，可以使用 "" 属性来自动调整面板的大小以适合面板的文本或填充 控件中的剩余空间。To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the control. 利用 属性，您可以指定面板的最小宽度，以确保它不会小于其要显示的数据。The property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display. 控件通常用于显示有关应用程序的帮助信息或状态信息。The control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application. 通常，要显示有关面板中显示的数据的其他信息，这一点很重要。Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel. 当鼠标指针停留在面板上时，可以使用 属性来显示信息。You can use the property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel. 尽管 控件通常用于显示文本信息，但您也可以向 提供自己的显示类型。Although the control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a . 利用 属性，您可以指定绘制 的方式。The property enables you to specify how the will be drawn. 默认情况下， 属性用于显示 属性的值（如果在 属性中指定，则显示一个图标）。By default, the property is used to display the value of the property (and an icon, if specified in the property). 如果将属性设置为 ""，则可以在面板中绘制自己的信息。If the property is set to , you can draw your own information into the panel. 您可以使用此功能在面板中绘制进度栏或动画图标。You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel. 创建 类的实例时，读/写属性将设置为初始值。When you create an instance of the class, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建 控件并添加两个 对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 名为 `panel1`的第一个 显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为 `panel2`的 显示当前日期，并使用 类的 属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用 属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并使用 属性访问 的 方法，以将面板添加到 。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用 、、和 属性来初始化 对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是在 的构造函数中定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 的实例时，以下读/写属性将设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||`null`| ||1010| ||| ||长度为零的字符串。A zero-length string.| ||长度为零的字符串。A zero-length string.| ||100100| 可以通过单独调用属性来更改任何这些属性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建 控件并添加两个 对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 名为 `panel1`的第一个 显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为 `panel2`的 显示当前日期，并使用 类的 属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用 属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并使用 属性访问 的 方法，以将面板添加到 。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用 、、和 属性来初始化 对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是在 的构造函数中定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置状态栏面板中文本和图标的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来水平对齐分配给面板边框内 属性的文本和/或图标。You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the property within the borders of the panel. 文本和图标可与 的左对齐、右对齐或居中对齐。Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the . 无法在 中单独定位图标。There is no way to independently position an icon within the . 例如，您不能将图标定位到 的左侧，同时使文本在右侧对齐。For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the while aligning the text on the right side. 图标始终定位到文本的左侧，而不考虑文本的对齐方式。The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and properties, and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法中调用 `InitializeStatusBarPanels` 方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为 的 对象优先于将这些面板设置为 值。 objects set to have precedence over those panels set to the value. 例如，如果 属性设置为 的 需要该空间，则将其 属性设置为 "" 的 。For example, a that has its property set to is shortened if a with the property set to requires that space. 您可以使用 确保 的内容在包含多个面板的 控件中正确显示。You can use to ensure that the contents of a are properly displayed in a control that contains more than one panel. 例如，你可能需要一个包含文本的面板自动调整为显示的文本量（），而 上显示所有者描述进度栏的另一个面板需要是固定大小（）。For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (), while another panel on the that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (). ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建 控件并添加两个 对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 名为 `panel1`的第一个 显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为 `panel2`的 显示当前日期，并使用 类的 属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用 属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并使用 属性访问 的 方法，以将面板添加到 。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用 、、和 属性来初始化 对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是在 的构造函数中定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性将面板与 控件中的其他面板区分开来。You can use this property to differentiate a panel from other panels in a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建 控件并添加两个 对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 名为 `panel1`的第一个 显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为 `panel2`的 显示当前日期，并使用 类的 属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用 属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并使用 属性访问 的 方法，以将面板添加到 。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用 、、和 属性来初始化 对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是在 的构造函数中定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示在状态栏面板中的图标。

span.span: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.

value.span: 表示要显示在面板中的图标。

span.span: An that represents the icon to display in the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来显示一个图标，该图标表示应用程序或应用程序中的进程的状态。You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application. 例如，可以在 中显示一个图标，以指示文件保存操作是正在进行还是已完成。For example, you can display an icon in a to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete. > [!NOTE] > 无法在 中单独定位图标。There is no way to independently position an icon within the . 例如，您不能将图标定位到 的左侧，同时使用 属性将右侧的文本对齐。For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the while aligning the text on the right side using the property. 不管文本的对齐方式如何，图标始终定位到面板文本的左侧。The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为 或 时，将使用 属性，以防止 自动调整到太小的宽度。The property is used when the property is set to or to prevent the from automatically resizing to a width that is too small. 属性设置为 时， 属性会自动设置为与 属性相同的值。When the property is set to , the property is automatically set to the same value as the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来指示 显示文本还是将面板作为所有者描述的 进行管理。You can use this property to indicate whether a displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn . 若要确定何时需要绘制 ，请为 控件的 事件创建事件处理程序。To determine when a needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the event of the control. 作为参数传递给 事件的事件处理程序的 使你可以确定需要绘制的面板。The passed as a parameter to an event handler of the event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn. 还提供了一个可用于对 执行绘图任务的 对象。The also provides a object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性、 委托、 类、 枚举和 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, delegate, class, enumeration, and property. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 在窗体的构造函数或 事件方法中调用 `InitializeStatusBarPanels` 方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/VB/form1.vb#2)]

member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置状态栏面板的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
The text displayed in the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示当 属性设置为 时显示的文本。This property represents the text that is displayed when the property is set to . 您可以使用此属性在 控件中显示有关您的应用程序的信息。You can use this property to display information about your application in a control. 例如，当用户将鼠标移动到菜单或显示在应用程序中打开的文件的名称和位置时，可以使用 属性来显示帮助信息。For example, you can use the property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application. 若要在 中对齐文本，请使用 "" 属性。To align the text within a , use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建 控件并添加两个 对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 名为 `panel1`的第一个 显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为 `panel2`的 显示当前日期，并使用 类的 属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用 属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并使用 属性访问 的 方法，以将面板添加到 。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用 、、和 属性来初始化 对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是在 的构造函数中定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与状态栏面板关联的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
The ToolTip text for the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针停留在 上时，可以使用此属性在工具提示中显示附加信息。You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a . 例如，可以显示工具提示，该工具提示为显示文件传输状态的 提供数据传输速度。For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a that displays the status of a file transfer. 若要在应用程序中显示其他控件的工具提示，请使用 控件。To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建 控件并添加两个 对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 名为 `panel1`的第一个 显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名为 `panel2`的 显示当前日期，并使用 类的 属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用 属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并使用 属性访问 的 方法，以将面板添加到 。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用 、、和 属性来初始化 对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是在 的构造函数中定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中状态栏面板的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the control.
The width, in pixels, of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性始终反映 的实际宽度，不能小于 属性。The property always reflects the actual width of a and cannot be smaller than the property. 若要将 的宽度自动调整到 的内容，可以使用 属性。To automatically resize the width of the to the contents of the , you can use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and properties, and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法中调用 `InitializeStatusBarPanels` 方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的宽度小于 属性的值。

span.span: The width specified is less than the value of the property.
